verbatim_example: It's been just over a week without bupe.
I shot up a couple of times
I didn't sleep for a 4 day span, and now sleep on and off an hour at a time. My thinking is still foggy from the Kratom, but it doesn't do much in regards to anxiety.
I feel like my blood pressure is through the roof, it messes with my vision and I sweat non-stop.
Going outside feels so terrifying, esp when I am physically shaking and in constant cold sweats.

My sleeping is extremely disturbed, I somehow got on this schedule in which I can seem to even find some comfort until 9-11am, but when I do sleep the sweat comes pouring out and I wake up feeling pretty bad.
The withdrawal was really intense, I was stuck to my apartment for almost the entire 3 weeks.
I'd usually take 2 and snort a half of one for a fast, hard come up and a pretty long high.
I am in the thick of wd.
Now that I am clean, I can barely get out of bed bc back and knees are so bad.
I am scared bc I know I will want to use.
I am happy to be here, sober .
I celebrated by not using. It was hard, so hard to actually deal with all that pain, and all of those emotions, but I made it.
I have been taking kratom since Tuesday to help withdrawal.
Still have the morning GI lingering around but the malaise is still the biggest pain in the ass.
I still blow up the bathroom in the morning but it doesn't persist all day.
I get these random flashes of old feelings that shoot through me for a few seconds-minutes. I try to slow down in those moments to actually feel some shit.
Hoping the work day passes quickly, looking forward to working out today so I have an excuse for sweaty pits!
started pouring sweat, plotting and rationalizing all the ways I could get around this security blanket that I've created, giving myself reasons as to why it would be okay,
Yesterday went pretty well other than a few cases of the clammy sweats.
Yesterday was okay minus a crazy afternoon episode of the sweats. I fuckin hate that feeling.
Symptoms at 3 weeks out... morning shits (a very zen one this morning at least), anhedonia waves, come and go restless limbs.
anxiety sweats, depressed, stir crazy, irritable, restless.
I've now gone five days without
Got lots of benzos just in case.
I was so fucked up on dope and xanax and kpins that i blacked out the entire way.
sweating like a dog even though my condo was 62 degrees
the worst part of WD to me is not being able to sleep, and the dreaded RLS. Benzos/barbs seem to be the only thing that can help me sleep while in WD (besides actual opiates, obviously).
I swear, that game is my first real experience with addiction.

I bought some Kratom, and have some muscle relaxers for the withdrawl I may experience. But, truth be told - my withdrawl isn't anywhere near what I've seen in others. Bone pain and exhaustion is about it.
That phenomenon of craving is so fucking real, and there has never been any doubt that I'm a true-blue addict regarding these pills.
Damn I snifee 5 bags n I an noddin outðŸ˜žf .
I am struggling atm. Depression is a big struggle and i just want to numb everything out.
This post likely wont be long as my focus isnt the best. I no i ahouldnt have gone back.
I been in the bathroom all day puking and shitting.
I am still getting used to being clean.
"Must Not Sleepâ€¦ must warn others"- I got this cause to me it's about staying self aware and in the moment which is a huge part of recovery and growing as a person.
This wheel that I'm grateful for everyday that I don't have to be on.
On the break I was busted and sent to detox there again for the fourth time.
gonna be in nodsville alllll day tomorrow
Have almost 15 days clean now and I notice recovery has been getting harder and harder for me the more i relapse.
I'm currently finishing up my fifth day sober-ish (on xanax rn) and through the worst of the physical WDs.
Today Junky Jesus screws me over by turning up 4x oxy 80mg's. I had no urge to buy today, but as soon as I had the pills in front of me I broke.
I involuntary retched and threw up all over my room, also I sneezed at least 10 times in a row (no exaggeration) and an ungodly amount of snot began dripping from my nose.

I've been desperately trying anything and everything that I think might give me a rush. Masturbating. Weed. Listening to music. Popping insane amounts of gabapentin. They all just leave me wanting more.
I wish. I'm three weeks clean and have found no happiness or clarity in sobriety. All I want is a bump. All I want is to be numb.
I was feeling extremely depressed, sweating, cold, jittery/RLS, classic mild WDs.
Staring at the ceiling at three in the morning, sweating and shaking, nothing else mattered.
So last weekend my original dude calls me. I was like fuck yeah and we went through the whole long process of back and forth trying to figure out when to meet.
I know about the insomnia, and the RLS, and the aches, and the sweats, and the depression, and the anxiety, as this is not my first time being without the drug,
Night sweats/clammy skin all that jazz have been pretty much non existent as well.
I used to only get it in my legs, but this time it's all over, arms, legs, hands, feet, torso???
I have like 3 out of 10 nausea all day and haven't had a solid movement in 10 days(used Lope taper to quit.)
I have the worst headache of my life achey and chilly, when I'm not feeling on fire.
I sneeze when I get high for some reason
I'm also ice cold, is that a withdrawal thing?
Bye-bye Egghead U, I'm going the hell home to a bath (my back!) and some sleep.
I ate through half a box of crackers and two apples, some cheese, and I can't stop drinking water. It's like my body WANTS to get better now.
My body went through an absolute horror show of pain. Fever, shakes, nausea, muscle cramps... insomnia, jesus.
By the time the conversation was over I wanted to be drunk or high, god I was frustrated.
I was addicted to heroin again after my first stint in rehab got me almost 6 months of sobriety.
This shit takes the withdrawals away but it is almost not even worth it. Sometimes I can do half a bag or 2 bags before I go bat shit insane.
I haven't used since the day but the cravings have been there 24/7.
kicked my h habit about 3 weeks ago and havenâ€™t had the urge to use more than every now and then since
when you feel you need to get out at moments of clarity and joy let it happen to let the Trick know what they have been missing. It doesn't have to be 24hr lockdown after the initial withdrawls.
Crawling my ass out of bed is easier.
I can't go more than 6 hours without starting to become sick.
If I did not dose every 5-6 hours the chills would set in, and I knew just how screwed I truley was.
Took the subs for 7 days, still felt a bit strange during that time. Probably the kratom withdrawal under the subs.
I was in brutal pain and going through withdrawals such as the tingling sensations.
I never get withdrawals; I use to but got past the worst of my addiction and now I only use two times a week give or take a day.
I have been for about 6 years everyday.
Lope definitely helped my withdrawals the first three days and then when I woke up on the 4th day, I felt completely fine.

Starting all over now. Day 3. My withdrawals are never really that bad besides the sleep problem but I just take two extremely high doses of loperamide each 48 hours apart and before I know it i'm clear of the withdrawals
Shooting dope became a urgency as I'd wake up frantically and call everybody trying to find someone to rip off or some way to score.
I have meditated on and off, usually when I had a steady supply of heroin. Was doing a bundle a day but now im 24 days clean
Well my dog started barking, and unbeknownst to me there was a duck frozen completely to the ground with a broken beak frantically trying to escape.
taking anything to stop the shaking,
I still have drug dreams 3 years later and honestly, I have no thoughts about going back to that life.
my hands are swollen as fuck, to my feet is covered by blood
Edit#1 d1 17:45: 2 hours later and I am still fine, she is shaking from the pain. Wtf
I am 13 hours into this hell, so that is a good start. My girlfriend is using several times a day right next to me, so I need some help resisting to ask her for some.
my eyes are watering like Iâ€™m almost crying for no reason so thats fun.

I went to buy a bag, but my dude know we trying to stop putting money in his pocket so the mf gives me four bags for free, cool dude, right? No, cuz now Iâ€™m going back to buy 10 more because those four bags put us back a hell of a lot and we are not ready to start all over.
They make the W 80% better, I am at day 3 of W but it feels like day 1.
The problem tho is that I have had mild withdrawals after that.
I had to start the wd all over but it is like 1/3 painfull so I am actually enjoying myself.
Being clean is hard but if I keep it up mabye some day I wonâ€™t have to keep fighting the urge to use or to kill myself.
The only WD symtoms I am still having is the sleep, only got 3 hours of sleep last night.
The only withdraw symptom that's still bad right now is the sleep.
I'm finally over the physical withdraws, which is great.
I'm shaking as I'm writing this.
Today is day 1 after coming off a two week run. Any idea on what to expect for withdrawal from only a 2 week run?
On Monday Iâ€™ll be 3 days into WD and will have to go back to work still dopesick
I am not going to go back and accept I made a mistake but did I just put myself back at day one again of withdraws?

Iâ€™ve been done the physical withdraws for like a week now, will this one night cause bad physical withdrawals again after being two weeks clean or will I just have that hangover feeling and feel tired and groggy for a few days?

My dealer always told me if I ever wanted to quit he would completely cut me off and I finally gave him the word and he completely cut me off lol. ... These ideas always sound so great when your high as a kite lol but now that Iâ€™m in the thick of it I want to shoot myself
Obviously the PAWS just makes it worse buts itâ€™s been a problem my whole life that I have not been able to conquer and has really held me back in life.
today I woke up around the same time and woke up sweaty with chills and hot flashes
We lost everything due to missing work due to withdrawals and kept coming back to it,

we are trying to figure out what we need to look into over the weekend, despite losing it all I am glad I can say we don't have to worry about where money will come and trying to get through each day without having to WD
Until one day I just had to leave because I was dope sick
Luckily I've only been using everyday for about 3 weeks, but fuck. I'm 24 hours into withdraw and it's tough. I have to say I don't feel as bad, physically, as I did when coming off oxy.
Today is day 13 for me! This is the longest I've been sober since summer 2011, and first time I'm really sober.
I haven't been sick in years, at least I haven't felt sick, other than withdrawals, in years.
I wasn't shivering with hot/cold sweats, I didn't have to worry about running out to pick up, and I wasn't achy all over cleaning my car off and shoveling this morning.
While I am currently keeping withdrawals at bay with 10 - 20mg a day of OC (I was pretty steady at 50 - 100mg a day, every day)
I, then, remember that I have fifty fucking adderalls in my closet. I take one, and I feel no more WD,
I had my last oxy yesterday morning -- then I had about 1mg of sub last night, and I'm 100% dry
Even on a sunny day, I'm shivering, and my nose is draining.
After 90 hours since my last oxycodone dose, I can officially say that I am withdrawal free (with minor exception)
I've had to call on my clean friends and therapist every single day for the past week. Hanging on for dear life here.
Lot harder to shake today than yesterday.
I smoked a roach I had in my ash tray on Friday night and felt immense relief from the nasty cravings I was/am getting for my DOC.
Unable to keep any food or even water down.
Even now, on day 6 and just barely through the worst of the physical symptoms, my desire to use is still there.
I just hit 96 hours into my current detox.
I'm tripping balls. I've been thankful to have some extra time before the event to continue to work on my shit but I'm also terrified that the life upheaval will be more than I WANT to handle.

After trying NA and all that and never making 60 days of being clean, I was in the suboxin program multiple times. I had finally made it, I thought, had a job, a car, was selling OxyContin in 09 and taking subs, had money,women, dope was never sick and after spending 5 hours trying to find a vein one day I just had enough and stopped.
I have been homeless have boosted and done various other things for a daily fix... Detox 7 times, impatient numerous times...

We started using together and he was shocked when he had the same shit happening to him. We were hanging out and smoking with our friend one day and brought this up to him and he was like damn guys, you're kicking!
I'm withdrawing and will be up aaall night. Would KILL for some benzos or something, but it is what it is.
I swear the withdrawals are just as bad if not worse than last time I detoxed even though I was doing significantly less, diff ROA and shorter time period. I'm almost 24 hours in and miserable.
Headed into day 4 now of withdrawal from bth. Far from my first rodeo but I'm at the breaking point.
At this point I'm so far in, have shed so much sweat and tears,
This combined with the physical symptoms were too much to bear.
My cravings are so few and far between compared to when I first got clean.
coming off a 3 week heroin binge that started because of my dopesick coming off of oxycodone. i'm expecting to be ready to die in about eight hours
does anyone with experience on heroin withdrawal know how much longer my body will feel like hell?
It was a really good idea. Thinking of coppin again on the weekend for Saturday night because I play a show... may hold off a bit longer so my W/D experience isnt as bad.
because for some reason I don't feel a craving for Oxy like I do with Heroin and as long as I do a tiny bit of opiate I can usually endure any remaining w/d symptoms.
Thats what's been keeping me through this withdrawal! I havent even had much cravings during my acute's
I haven't even got the crazy rib pains, or really anything besides lethargy/sweats/cold chills.
Whenever one of us needs to get sober, despite the pain, the other is always right there. It's really nice.
the withdrawal symptoms i get when i wake up in the morning are a bit worse than i'd have from the suboxone, but still not really anything that bad.
All these horror stories about Sub w/d is making me concerned, but I figure I havent taken enough or long enough to get any serious w/d from the Sub
Maybe its the withdrawl, maybe I'm just crazy, maybe I don't have what it takes to overcome my issues.
I took some Vikes, about 20mg of them, it fended off the H w/d
I have some sub's I can take so that should help buy still need to wait another 12 hour before I can take it.
I was in hardcore, white knuckle, cold turkey withdrawal(puking, shitting, cold sweats, can't get comfortable, etc).
I mean at this point I've used everyday for a week and now get withdrawals again.
I hear the depression lasts month.
the most intense cravings i've ever had
Today I've been having crazy anxiety and dizziness,
Un-fucking-believably, I have mild withdrawl today. stomach cramping, aches, slight runny nose...
I was flopping and moaning in pain like a fish. sweating anxiety
it's not treating me well and my friends are at work and my girlfriend gave up lmao I'm ready to fucking quit, it's not the high for me that keeps me on it it's running from the WD
I wake up throwing up because of the short half life
I'm eating 20 mix of pills (clonodine, diazepam, visteril, tylonal and whatever helps until my dealer wakes up) and that barely keeps the WD at bay.
I wake up in severe pain if I haven't used within 12 hours.
I started withdrawing 18 hours out. I'm talking puking and everything so I just went back to what I knew fixed it.
One time I took suboxone 2 hours after my last dose of heroin and was fine, but one time I took a subutex 26 hours after last dose and went into precip WD.
I went into percip withdrawal nothing crazy just some RLS and anxiety and all that moderate WD.
My levels are down to 51, 50 is the cutoff
I finally got off of dope using a sub taper. Coming up on 6 months clean from heroin/fent.
7 hours after ingesting 90mg of oxy, I am knee deep in fucking withdrawals.
